tool_description:
More than 20.000 games ready to be used for your website or application.
Board game names, Ratings, minimum age, minimum and maximum number of players, year of publishment and play time in minutes ready for whatever project you're working on.
name: Boardgames
title: Boardgames

api_list.name: Get games example
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boardgames.p.rapidapi.com/game/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boardgames.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boardgames.p.rapidapi.com/game/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boardgames.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
